TutorialTopSceneController_Text_9:
In order to track sleep, the app needs
permission to record audio.
TutorialTopSceneController_Text_5:
The app can’t track your sleep
because it doesn’t have permission
to record audio.

Please go to your device’s settings
and grant the app access to your
microphone.
TutorialTopSceneController_Text_6:
This Pokémon GO Plus + is registered
to another device.
TutorialTopSceneController_Text_7:
The Pokémon GO Plus + is
malfunctioning or something is
preventing communication.

TutorialTopScene_GPPInfoPopup_Title: Tracking Sleep with Pokémon GO Plus +
TutorialTopScene_GPPInfoPopup_Text_1:
Track your sleep with your Pokémon
GO Plus +, then open Pokémon Sleep,
and the device and app will sync
automatically.
TutorialTopScene_GPPInfoPopup_Text_2:
If the automatic sync does not occur,
press the Sync GO Plus + button.
TutorialTopScene_Option_Others_Quality_T:
Note: This selection can be changed
later through the in-app settings.
